title: Impact of industrial agriculture on the US

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. A. Define “industrial agriculture.” B. Identify and describe ONE benefit of industrial agriculture. C. Discuss TWO environmental impacts associated with industrial agriculture.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, and C. A. Define “industrial agriculture.” B. Identify and describe ONE benefit of industrial agriculture. C. Discuss TWO environmental impacts associated with industrial agriculture.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
